long_description: The women's Fjallraven Skogso Jacket is a lightweight, mid-length trekking jacket made of a sturdy polyester/cotton blend. Jacket combines Fjallraven's classic G-1000(R) fabric with the lighter-weight G-1000 Lite, both tightly woven polyester/cotton. Hood features 3-way adjustments. Pre-shaped sleeves on the Fjallraven Skogso Jacket free up arm movements. 2-way center-front zipper is protected by a flap with metal snaps. Big hand pockets for storage have mesh lining for ventilation; 1 small inside pocket. Adjustable hem and snap-close cuffs seal out weather; leather trim.
short_description: The women's Fjallraven Skogso Jacket is a lightweight, mid-length trekking jacket made of a sturdy polyester/cotton blend.
